Package team23.smartHomeSimulator.controller

Class DashboardController

java.lang.Object
team23.smartHomeSimulator.controller.DashboardController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api")
public class DashboardController
extends java.lang.Object
The DashboardController allows to call actions inside the various modules such SHH, SHC, and SHP

    • runningOn

      @PutMapping("/running") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> runningOn()
      set running state to true
      Returns:
      200 OK, no exception handling for now and new status

    • runningOff

      200 OK, no exception handling for now and new status

      requestBody - JSON request body in this format { "currentTime": "2020-10-15" }
